column5: Here's what I woke up to this morning
I would have rather wake up to that than the 8" of rain  , a flooded basement   and washed out local roads  . Nice pics however
i would rather of woke up to the sun shinning, the birds chirping and fresh tim hortons   raining here tho.. lol
welcome to eastern Ontario.... oh and you can just keep that white stuff down there, I will keep the rain here
DARN IT ALL, I want both, rain and snow. OK, mostly rain this time of the year. We need it desperately.  Why did you get all the luck of getting snow?
nuthin here in K-town. Just a lotta wind....and I'm ok with that
